jcr:root.fieldDescription: Checking this box will cause the evergreen tree icon to appear next to this resource
jcr:root.name: ./dc:isOutdoorRelated

listeners.beforeloadcontent: function(f, r, p) { if ((p.indexOf("/content/dam/girlscouts-vtkcontent") < 0) &&(p.indexOf("/content/dam/girlscouts-vtk") < 0)) { f.hide(); } return true; }
